page.title: 12Food Shopping in Hereford.
page.content: Most people nowadays have one big shop to last a whole week. In our class 77% of parents do just that,7% shop twice a week,7% three times a week, 7% do a huge shop once a month (think of the cost!) and one person goes every day. A couple of years ago a new Tesco {superstore}opened in the city centre, and we were amazed to find that all parents do most of their shopping there or at one of the other large supermarkets. But what about the{small local {shops?}We have come to the conclusion that, since no one buys all their food from them, they are used only for odds and ends and in emergencies. Will the situation change or will the small shops go out of business? Only time will tell_ we hope they don't!
